column3: I been hanging round this place,, I been looking through your space
column4: I been waiting' for you,, I've been waiting' for you
column5: All the places that you go,, all the people that you know
column6: I've been looking for you,, I've been looking for you
column9: And all these pretty people up on El Cerrito Place
column10: They all got something in their pockets,, all got something on their face
column11: They roll down to La Brea where it meets the boulevard
column12: Singing' hallelujah while they dance over the stars
column13: They all say they're going' far
column16: Me I've been looking for you baby,, I've been looking for you baby
column17: I've been looking for you baby,, I've been looking for you baby
column18: All night long,, all night long,, all night long
column21: Someone said they might have seen you where the ocean meets the land
column22: So I've been out here all night looking for your footprints in the sand
column23: Did you hear the ocean singing,, baby did you sing along
column24: While you danced out in the water to some ol' forgotten song
column25: Were you even here at all?
column30: Somehow I wound up in the desert just after daylight
column31: Where the Joshua Trees grow that little place you always liked
column32: These pioneer town people ain't got too much to say
column33: And if you ever were here baby they ain't giving' you away
column37: I'm still looking for you baby,, I've been looking for you baby
column38: I've been looking for you baby,, I've been looking for you baby
column39: All night long,, all night long,, all night long
column42: And all these pretty people up on El Cerrito Place
column43: They all got something in their pockets,, all got something on their face
column45: Someone said they might have seen you where the ocean meets the land
column46: So I've been out here all night looking for your footprints in the sand
column49: Think I'll go back to the city,, back to El Cerrito Place
column50: That's the last time that I saw that pretty smile upon your face
column51: I've been looking for you baby
